author: Special Correspondent
text:
Grievance day meetings tomorrow

The Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation will conduct meetings in Madurai and Samayanallur on January 7 to hear grievances from power consumers.

According to a Tangedco press release, power consumers of Tamukkam, Race Course, Sellur, Tagore Nagar, Chokkikulam, Narimedu, Krishnapuram Colony, Tiruppalai, Anaiyur, Athikulam, Anna Nagar, K. K. Nagar, K. Pudur and Melamadai can air their grievances at the meeting to be conducted by the Superintending Engineer, Metro, at the office of the Executive Engineer, North Division, Madurai, between 11 a.m. and 1 p.m.

Consumers of Samayanallur Division can represent their grievances at the meeting to be held by the Superintending Engineer, Madurai Electricity Distribution Circle, at the office of the Executive Engineer, Samayanallur, between 11 a.m. and 1.30 p.m.
title: Grievance meetin tomorrow
